roamingMonsterLevel1.name: Lyidan, Incubus Lord
roamingMonsterLevel1.action: If Lyidan is in a Light Zone: Lyidan takes 3 Wounds and moves to the closest Shadow Zone.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action2: If there is a Hero up to 3 Zones away (regardless of LoS): Place Lyidan in the Zone with the furthest Hero up to 3 Zones away (regardless of LoS). Add 1 h to that Hero and attack them.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action3: ATTACK 1 e : After combat, resolve all h on the defending Hero (once per combat).

roamingMonsterLevel1.name: Ytheria, Undead Queen
roamingMonsterLevel1.action: If there is more than 1 Hero in LoS: Ytheria attacks each Hero in LoS (resolve each attack seperately)
roamingMonsterLevel1.action2: If there is only 1 Hero in LoS: Ytheria attacks that Hero with +1 s
roamingMonsterLevel1.action3: ATTACK 1 e : Add 1 Minion to each Mob in the Dungeon, if possible.

roamingMonsterLevel1.name: Andra
roamingMonsterLevel1.action: If Andra is in the Dungeon: Andra attack the Hero with the lowest Health in LoS, if possible. Then, remove Andra from the Dungeon.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action2: If Andra is not in the Dungeon: Place Andra in a Zone adjacent to the Hero with the lowest Health. Then Andra attacks that Hero.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action3: COMBAT 1 e : Deal 1 Wound to another Hero with the lowest Health in LoS.

roamingMonsterLevel1.name: The Ghoul
roamingMonsterLevel1.action: If there is a Minion in the Ghoul's Zone: Kill 1 Minion in that Zone (players choose) and The Ghoul Heals 5.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action2: Otherwise: The Ghoul moves 3 Zones toward the closest Hero and attacks them, if possible.
roamingMonsterLevel1.action3: COMBAT 1 e : Move the closest Mob 1 Zone toward The Ghoul.
